mapper.insert: insert into image(folder_id, image_name, path, url, size, create_time) value (#{folderId}, #{imageName}, #{path}, #{url}, #{size}, NOW())
mapper.select: select i.id, i.folder_id as folderId, f.folder_name as folderName, i.image_name as imageName, i.path, i.url, i.size, i.create_time as createTime from image i left join folder f on i.folder_id = f.id
